English: Can use "Lost Christmas" when stacks are fully accumulated.
Chinese: 叠满层数后可以使用“失落圣诞”。

English:
Each turn, suffer &a (5% of Yuzuriha's Max HP * stacks) Pain damage.
At the end of the turn, if Crystallization stacks ≥5, become "Completely Crystallized".
Chinese:
每回合受到&a(5%楪祈最大生命值*层数）的痛苦伤害。
回合结束时，若晶化层数≥5，则会使自身“完全晶化”。
防御力变为原来的负数。

English: When taking damage, deal &a (Barrier value) damage to the damage source.
Chinese: 受到伤害时，对伤害源造成&a(保护罩值)点伤害。

English:
Fyu-Neru deals an additional &b (20% of Yuzuriha's ATK) damage to the target after each attack.
Only one Fyu-Neru can exist at a time.
Chinese:
飞那鲁会在每次攻击后对目标额外造成&b(20%楪祈攻击力)的伤害。
同一时间只能存在一个飞那鲁。

English: Gain +1 Barrier at the start of the turn.
Gain 1 Mana at the start of the turn.
Chinese: 回合开始时获得一点法力值。

English: Can I stay by your side forever? I want to know about you... and everyone else...
Chinese: 我可以一直待在你身边吗？因为我想知道你的事，还有大家的事，所以...

English:
Adds "Void Greatsword" to the inventory upon entering the first scene.
The "Void Greatsword" strengthens as Yuzuriha levels up (active when equipped).
Chinese:
进入第一个场景时将“歌者闇剑”置入背包。
“歌者闇剑”会随着楪祈等级的增加而强化（装备时生效）。

English:
A girl imbued with void energy, capable of manifesting mysterious crystalline structures. Her singing voice purifies souls. Beneath her calm exterior lies dormant power.

Yuzuriha's void takes the form of a massive sword, enabling its wielder to surpass their limits. She excels at conjuring crystalline barriers to protect allies and hinder foes.
Chinese:
拥有虚空能量的少女，可以随意幻化出某种神秘而特殊的晶体，歌声能够净化人的心灵。平静的外表中似乎隐藏着某种可怕的力量。

楪祈的虚空是一把威力巨大的巨剑，可以令持有者发挥出超越自身的力量。与此同时，楪祈擅长幻化各种形态的晶体保护队友和阻挡敌人。

English: I don't care if I'm a monster. Even with false emotions, I'll protect you.
Chinese: 我是怪物也无所谓，就算是假的感情，我也要保护你。

English: Stay by my side... I'll always support you.
Chinese: 要一直在我身边哦，因为我会永远支持你。

English: Unlock it. Trying might work, but not trying guarantees failure.
Chinese: 解开它,试试的话也许能行,但是,不尝试的话就绝对办不到。

English: Those who harm others must be prepared to be harmed.
Chinese: 伤害别人的人，就要有被伤害的觉悟。
没关系,总有一天我也会...

English: Believe in yourself. You can do it—because I belong to you now.
Chinese: 相信自己，绝对可以的，因为我已经是属于你的了。

English: I... don't want to kill anyone. So please, stay back.
Chinese: 我尽可能的，不想杀人，所以，别过来。

English: This is my new song. If you don't mind... would you listen?
Chinese: 这个，是我的新歌，不介意的话，听听看吧。

English: No... This song... it's wrong now.
Chinese: 不对，这首歌，已经不对了。

English: I'm sorry... I don't know why...
Chinese: 对不起，我不知道为什么...

English: Let me bear this pain for you.
Chinese: 就让我来替你承受这份痛楚吧。

English: Let me bear this pain for you.
Chinese: 就让我来替你承受这份痛楚吧。

English:
This equipment's stats scale with Yuzuriha's level.
Using skills deals additional "Sword Energy" damage equal to 40% of ATK (once per turn).
Reduces damage taken, with reduction scaling by Yuzuriha's level.
Chinese:
此装备属性会随着楪祈等级的增加而增加。
使用技能时会额外对目标造成40%攻击力的“剑气”伤害（一回合触发一次）。
受到伤害减少，减少量随着楪祈等级增加而增加。

English: Cast twice. Additional cast once on the "Void Greatsword" wielder.
Chinese: 释放2次，额外对“歌者闇剑”持有者释放1次。

English:
Add 1 stack of "Void Resonance" to the "Void Greatsword".
If lacking "Hardened Crystal Armor", gain 1 stack of it.
Generate &a (50% of Yuzuriha's missing HP) Barrier.
Chinese:
为“歌者闇剑”额外叠加一层“空洞共鸣”。
若自身没有“硬化晶甲”，则额外叠加一层“硬化晶甲”。
生成&a(50%楪祈已损失生命值）点防护墙。

English: Cost -10 when "True Name Awakening" reaches max stacks.
Chinese: 当“真名觉醒”层数达到满层时费用-10。
生成&a(60%最大生命值)点防护墙。

English:
Deal &a additional instances (equal to number of enemies) of &b (10% of ATK) damage.
Grant the "Void Greatsword" wielder 1 stack of "Reflective Crystal Armor".
If under "True Name Awakening", generate &c (30% of Max HP) Barrier.
Chinese:
额外造成&a次(敌人数量)&b(自身10%攻击力)点伤害。
额外为“歌者闇剑”拥有者叠加一层“反射晶甲”。
若自身带有“真名觉醒”效果，则生成&c(30%最大生命值)点防护墙。

English: Yuzuriha summons Fyu-Neru to assist an ally.
Chinese: 楪祈召唤飞那鲁辅助指定友方作战。

English:
Generate &a (20% of Yuzuriha's ATK) Barrier.
Grant all allies 1 stack of "Cover".
Chinese:
生成&a(20%楪祈攻击力）点防护墙。
给予所有友方一层“掩护”效果。

English:
Remove all debuffs from allies.
Heal all allies for &a (20% of user's Max HP).
Chinese:
解除所有友方所有减益效果。
恢复所有友方&a(20%使用者最大生命值）点生命。

English:
Generate &a (20% of Max HP) Barrier.
Grant the "Void Greatsword" wielder 1 stack of "Regenerative Crystal Armor".
Chinese:
生成&a(20%最大生命值)点防护墙。
为“歌者闇剑”的持有者额外添加一层“再生晶甲”。

English:
Remove all skill Overload.
Generate Barrier equal to remaining Mana (3 Barrier per 1 Mana).
Grant the "Void Greatsword" wielder 1 stack of "Energy Crystal Armor".
Chinese:
消除所有技能过载。
根据剩余法力值生成相应数值的防护墙。（每1点法力值生成3点防护墙）。
额外给予“歌者闇剑”拥有者一层“聚能晶甲”。

English:
Add 2 stacks of "Void Resonance" to the "Void Greatsword" wielder.
The "Void Greatsword" wielder performs 3 "Sword Energy" attacks on the target.
Chinese:
为“歌者闇剑”拥有者额外叠加2层“空洞共鸣”。
令“歌者闇剑”拥有者对目标造成3次“剑气”攻击。

English:
Apply 1 stack of "Void Resonance" to self and the "Void Greatsword" wielder.
Generate &a (40% of Yuzuriha's current HP) Barrier.
Chinese:
为自身与“歌者闇剑”拥有者叠加一层“空洞共鸣”。
生成&a(40%楪祈剩余生命值)点防护墙。

English: If wielding the "Void Greatsword", gain 2 stacks of "Hardened Crystal Armor".
Chinese: 若持有“歌者闇剑”，则为自身叠加两层“硬化晶甲”。
